title: s system
body: ok i had a game and i was ekko jg i finished 14/1/7 and i didnt get s rank but a morgana was 5/3/22 and she did get s rank can someone explain to how does thes system work

replies.body: You did a great job, but the grading system isn't comparing you against others in that match.  It's looking at other Ekko players who performed in the same role as you, per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  Nice job, though, and keep at it!
